articles.title: India out to combat top-order blues in series decider | Cricbuzz.com - Cricbuzz - Cricbuzz
articles.description: Australia seek World Cup boost at the end of an arduous tour
articles.content: If you look to your left from the local train as you enter the Chepauk station, you'll get a glimpse of a massive MS Dhoni mural in the stadium premises. The venue has had an art-fuelled facelift and… [+3940 chars]
